title: Immune-Related Adverse Events for Renal Toxicities - Nephritis
desc: The Immune-Related Adverse Events for Renal Toxicities - Nephritis grades severity of nephritis secondary to immune checkpoint inhibitor therapy.

orgreference.text: Brahmer JR, Lacchetti C, Schneider BJ, et al. Management of Immune-Related Adverse Events in Patients Treated With Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor Therapy: American Society of Clinical Oncology Clinical Practice Guideline. J Clin Oncol. 2018;36(17):1714-1768.

data.evidence:
Criteria

Nephritis grade

 

Creatinine level increase of >0.3 mg/dL; creatinine 1.5-2.0x over baseline

G1

Creatinine 2-3x above baseline

G2

Creatinine >3x baseline or >4.0 mg/dL; hospitalization indicated

G3

Life-threatening consequences; dialysis indicated

G4

See Next Steps for details on management.
